name: get_latest_article_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool malaysia_kini.
Tool description: Live News by Malaysia Kini
API description: Fetches a list of the latest news articles for a specified language from the Malaysia Kini API.

language.description: The language code for which to fetch the latest news articles. Supported languages include English ('en'), Malay ('my'), and Chinese ('zh').
